arts.ttl: West Ham vs Newcastle: Espirito Santo picks up first win of his tenure
arts.sum: The main talking points from London Stadium, where West Ham United picked the first win of the Nuno Espirito Santo era.
Follow live match updates as West Ham host Newcastle in the Premier League on Sunday - kick-off 2pm - with in-game clips and full match highlights at FT.

arts.ttl: West Ham United v Newcastle United : Nuno drops Bombshell XI.. Finally!
arts.sum: Seventy five minutes to go before the start of West Ham’s encounter with visitors Newcastle United and Nuno esspirito Santo’s latest team selection has been announced. After the last two weird and wacky starting elevens – which have been hastily abandoned at half time with multiple substitutes – fans can only hope that Nuno has […] Source

arts.ttl: Eddie Howe’s guessing game | West Ham United v Newcastle United
arts.sum: Newcastle United head to London Stadium this afternoon as overwhelming favourites, West Ham not having won at home since February. Sooner or later, every ‘trend’ gets cast aside and Hammers fans can only hope that today the form book goes out of the window: Predictions from all the usual pundits foretell of a Newcastle goal […] Source

arts.ttl: Newcastle United XI vs West Ham United – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Newcastle United travel to the London Stadium on Sunday full of confidence. They will be aiming to continue their dominance in this particular fixture. The Magpies are unbeaten in their last six visits to West Ham’s home ground. Furthermore, they arrive having won four of their last five games in all competitions. arts.ttl: West Ham United vs Newcastle United – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: West Ham United are in a desperate search for their first home win of the season as they prepare to host an in-form Newcastle United at the London Stadium on Sunday. The Hammers sit 19th in the Premier League table. arts.sum: West Ham United host Newcastle United on Sunday. This has become a critical match for new manager Nuno Espírito Santo. The Hammers are in dire form.
